item.title: Install Smokeping via yum
item.author: liuzh66@gmail.com (刘征 Martin Liu)
item.description:
From :http://ai.net.nz/horde/wicked/display.php?page=SmokePing Install needed packages rrdtool `yum install rrdtool <br />**perl-CGI-SpeedyCGI**<br /> `yum install perl-CGI-SpeedyCGI
fping `yum install fping <br />** Or do them all together:**<br /> `yum install rrdtool perl-CGI-SpeedyCGI fping
Smokeping `wget http://people.ee.ethz.ch/~oetiker/webtools/smokeping/pub/smokeping-2.0.9.tar.gztar xvzf smokeping-2.0.9.tar.gzmv smokeping-2.0.9 /usr/local/smokepingchown -R root:root /usr/local/smokeping<br /><br />cd /usr/local/smokeping/binfor foo in *.dist; do cp $foo `basename $foo .dist`; done<br /><br />cd /usr/local/smokeping/etc/for foo in *.
